oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Excerpt from consolidation interview with Buster Boguskie, January 19, 1995
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An excerpt from an interview with Buster Boguskie, conducted on January 19, 1995 by Carole Bucy as part of the Metro Consolidation Oral History Interviews. Boguskie discusses his role in the consolidation of the city and county governments. He also comments briefly on other individuals and their contributions. The complete record of the interview is available at the Metro Government Archives.
